step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow straighter for better resistance.
You're opening your palm and fingers well. Focus on keeping your arm extended overhead throughout this step.
Making a fist and tightening your muscles is great. Remember to inhale as you do this.
Opening your hand and relaxing is good. Ensure you exhale during this part and visualize the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Keep stretching your arm up and focus on making a strong fist while inhaling, then relaxing your hand as you exhale. This helps move fluid effectively.
